QuestData.Title: Into the Maw!
QuestData.Description: $n, there you are! Goldrinn has a mission that only his champion can accomplish. Atop the Lightning Ledge, Twilight's Hammer has erected a flamegate. We don't know where it leads, but Goldrinn can't enter. The ancient needs you to be his fangs.$B$BStep into the flamegate and talk to Jordan Olafson when you get inside. He'll give you a token to allow you to use Goldrinn's power in that realm. Find out where the flamegate leads!
QuestData.LogDescription: Step through the flamegate atop the Lightning Ledge in Mount Hyjal, and speak with Jordan Olafson within.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Step through the flamegate atop the Lightning Ledge in Mount Hyjal, and speak with Jordan Olafson within.
